WorkItem.Description:
We develop commercial software. 
Where should I include the copyright notice so that the licence terms would not be extend to our commercial application altogether?

Comments.Message:
Hi,

MVVM Light is distributed under the MIT license which allows using it in commercial software. Please check the license terms here: https://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/license

This is not an issue, so I am closing this.

Thanks
Laurent
